articles.title: Komodo dragons: Indonesians strike over entry price hike
articles.description: Officials want to end mass tourism to the national park, but workers say it threatens their livelihoods.
articles.content:
By Malu CursinoBBC News
Indonesian tourism workers have gone on strike over a dramatic hike in the price of tickets to see Komodo dragons.

articles.title: Man caught in Windsor Castle grounds charged
articles.description: Jaswant Singh Chail, from Southampton, was found in the castle grounds on Christmas Day, police say.
articles.content: Jaswant Singh Chail, aged 20 and from Southampton, has also been charged with threats to kill and possession of an offensive weapon, said the Metropolitan Police.
